channel.title: There is a guide that specifically describes the function of each single legacy object?
channel.description:
I'm searching a guide that specifically describes the function of each single object, in particular how every pot/knob/button do, also some exemple of application...
I've found a list of all objects but without a exhaustive explanation at this link
http://www.privatepublic.de/public/factory-objectlist.html

item.title: There is a guide that specifically describes the function of each single legacy object?
item.dc:creator: @KF78 KevinFollet
item.description:
@KF78 wrote:

Thank you axoloti king I'll try surely!
I've already tried with help feature but sometimes it opens another patch (sub I suppose) without any other explanation...works it only with examples?
Thanks again üèª

Read full topic
item.source: There is a guide that specifically describes the function of each single legacy object?

item.title: There is a guide that specifically describes the function of each single legacy object?
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

KF78:

describes the function of each single object, in particular how every pot/knob/button do, also some exemple of application...

"Hovering" your mouse cursor over inlets/outlets/parameters in Axoloti will often show some extra info.
An example patch demonstrating the functionality of many objects can be found by clicking the "downwards triangle" icon at the top left of every object, and selecting "help".

Read full topic
